comment: If you put in the effort, Professor T will work with you! Would love to take this class again.
Professor Terri is very clear about what she expects from you. Gives amazing feedback on the writing assignments. Quizzes/tests are very easy if you read the powerpoint, also open notes.

If you have the VBP project, it can get a little stressful and challenging, but if you commit and work well with your group, you should be fine.  Other than that, the assignments required in this course were manageable.  Several quizzes and discussions, however nothing extreme.  Great class and professor!
rating_tags: Group projects--Clear grading criteria--So many papers

comment: I highly recommend this course and would take this professor again. There are two group projects and two individual assignments which were relatively simple. All the papers are single-spaced. No lockdown browser. Encouraged to use any and everything for the exam, except for help from another student.

All I have to say is Terri is a great professor. But if you take this class and see in the syllabus VBP Project in the list of group projects either drop the class right now or be prepared for a living heck of a project �� that is all
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Group projects--So many papers

comment: Very nice professor! Took her online for MGT 4171 and 4161 at the same time. 4161 was easy and had a few discussion posts, group proj, and couple of easy tests. 4171 was a TON of individual assignments, weekly discussion, group project, and two tests. 4171 was fairly easy but need time to do everything. She gives great feedback and clear grading.
Professor E truly wants you to learn and do well in her class. Put in effort and complete all assignments and you will do great. Highly recommend.
